name: South Road Encounters
description: Random encounters for the road South of Greyhaven

results.text: Militia patrol ensuring safe passage.
Traveling merchant or wagon offers trade.
Farmer needs help repairing a cart.
Herd of animals crosses the road.
Minor environmental hazard (mudslide, fallen tree).
Lost traveler asks for directions.
Small group of bandits tries opportunistic theft.
Harper agent discreetly observes road.
Animal attack (bear, wolf).
Unusual magical phenomenon (minor).
Roadside shrine with potential quest.
Signs of Blight encroachment at road edges.
Friendly caravan traveling south.
Wounded traveler found, needs aid.
Trader hides illegal goods (Zhentarim), adventurers notice.
Lost animal from farm wanders onto road.
Encounter a wandering bard or storyteller.
Small environmental obstacle (fallen branches, rockslide).
Orc patrol spotted at a distance.
Mysterious footprints leading into the woods.
